## Warm-Up

```{r}
animals <- c("brown bear", "red bird", "yellow duck", "blue horse")

for (i in 1:(length(animals) -1)) {
  
  print(paste(animals[i], animals[i], "what do you see?", "I see a", animals[i + 1], "looking at me"))
}
```
